template.name: Full Process Of Mail to postgresql Database

entry.value: INSERT INTO public.message_tbl ( "email.headers.subject", "email.headers.sent_date", "email.headers.from.0", "email.headers.to.0", "email.headers.message-id", msgbody, status ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?);
email.headers.from.0, email.headers.message-id, email.headers.sent_date, email.headers.subject, email.headers.to.0, msgbody, status

INSERT INTO public.message_tbl ( "email.headers.subject", "email.headers.sent_date", "email.headers.from.0", "email.headers.to.0", "email.headers.message-id", msgbody, status ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?);

import email import mimetypes from email.parser import Parser from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from java.io import BufferedReader, InputStreamReader from org.apache.nifi.processors.script import ExecuteScript from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import InputStreamCallback from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
class PyInputStreamCallback(InputStreamCallback): _text = None
def __init__(self): pass
def getText(self) : return self._text
def process(self, inputStream): self._text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
flowFile = session.get() if flowFile is not None : reader = PyInputStreamCallback() session.read(flowFile, reader)
msg = email.message_from_string(reader.getText()) body = ""
if msg.is_multipart(): for part in msg.walk(): ctype = part.get_content_type() cdispo = str(part.get('Content-Disposition'))
if ctype == 'text/plain' and 'attachment' not in cdispo: body = part.get_payload(decode=True) # decode break else: body = msg.get_payload(decode=True)
flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'msgbody', body.decode('utf-8', 'ignore'))
session.transfer(flowFile, ExecuteScript.REL_SUCCESS)
email.headers.from.0, email.headers.message-id, email.headers.sent_date, email.headers.subject, email.headers.to.0, msgbody, status

import email import mimetypes from email.parser import Parser from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from java.io import BufferedReader, InputStreamReader from org.apache.nifi.processors.script import ExecuteScript from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import InputStreamCallback from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
class PyInputStreamCallback(InputStreamCallback): _text = None
def __init__(self): pass
def getText(self) : return self._text
def process(self, inputStream): self._text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
flowFile = session.get() if flowFile is not None : reader = PyInputStreamCallback() session.read(flowFile, reader)
msg = email.message_from_string(reader.getText()) body = ""
if msg.is_multipart(): for part in msg.walk(): ctype = part.get_content_type() cdispo = str(part.get('Content-Disposition'))
if ctype == 'text/plain' and 'attachment' not in cdispo: body = part.get_payload(decode=True) # decode break else: body = msg.get_payload(decode=True)
flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'msgbody', body.decode('utf-8', 'ignore'))
session.transfer(flowFile, ExecuteScript.REL_SUCCESS)
INSERT INTO public.pax_details (passport_no, pax_master_id, pax_name, is_archived, docs, ticket_no) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?);
